movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story of Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted man from Alabama.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.name: The Godfather: Part II
movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone is portrayed, while his son expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an imprisoned and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

movies.name: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland, a businessman becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

movies.name: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

movies.name: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy and destitute.

movies.name: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime.

movies.name: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
